problems.title: Shortest Palindrome (String Algorithm)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given a string s. You can convert s to a palindrome by adding characters in front of it.
Return the shortest palindrome you can find by performing this transformation.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
aacecaaa

Sample Output
aaacecaaa

Explanation: Add "aa" in front to make it a palindrome.

Sample Input
abcd

Sample Output
dcbabcd

Explanation: Add "dcba" in front to make it a palindrome.
problems.constraints:
0 <= s.length <= 5 * 10^4
s consists of lowercase English letters only.
hintsList: Find the longest palindromic prefix of the string.
Reverse the remaining suffix and add it to the front.
